translations.translation: just like closely guarded pearls.
Like sheltered eggs in a nest.
so delicate as the hidden peel under an egg's shell.
who are as chaste as sheltered eggs.
As if they were eggs, safely hidden.
as if they were Bayd Maknun.
As if they were eggs carefully protected.
as if they were hidden pearls.
(Pure) as they were hidden eggs (of the ostrich).
like closely guarded pearls.
As though they were eggs hidden.
as if they were hidden ostrich eggs.
As if they were (delicate) eggs closely guarded.
(Delicate and pure) as if they were (hidden) eggs (well) preserved.
as if they were hidden pearls.
As if they were closely guarded pearls.
As if they were [delicate] eggs, well-protected.

[37:49] as if they were, in terms of [the starkness of their white] colour, hidden eggs, of ostriches, sheltered by their feathers from dust, the colour being that whiteness with a hint of pallor, which is the most beautiful of female complexions.
(As they were hidden eggs) in their purity, in both heat and cold.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { بَيْضٌ مَّكْنُونٌ } معناه مَصونٌ

translations.translation: And His saying, {Byzantine maknoon} means protected

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ كَأَنَّهُنَّ } في صفاء البدن وبياضه { بَيْضٌ مَّكْنُونٌ } [الصافات: 49] مصون محفوظ عن الغبار
 مخلوط بأدنى صفرة كلون الفضة
 وهو أحسن ألوان جسد الإنسان

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ كأنهنَّ بَيْضٌ مكنونٌ } مصون مستور
 شبههنّ ببيض النعام المكنون من الريح والغبار
 في الصفاء والبياض
